summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of the restructured 3D Scroll Effects tabbed app. All 6 categories with 12 total animations are working correctly. Sidebar navigation, category switching, example tabs, scroll interactions, and responsive design all pass.

issues: Category buttons show only icons on mobile (by design), but no tooltip/label visible - users may not know what each icon represents

critical_code_review_comments: ESLint shows 103 errors but most are false positives for React Three Fiber JSX properties (position, args, rotation, etc.) - these are valid R3F syntax
Math.random() in useMemo is acceptable since it only runs once with empty dependency array
setActiveExample(0) in useEffect is valid pattern for resetting state on category change
context_for_next_testing_agent: App restructured from single scrolling page to tabbed interface. 6 categories in sidebar: Tunnel Effects, Velocity Deformation, Shader Effects, Exploded Views, Rotation Mapping, Parallax Layers. Each category has 2 example animations accessible via tabs. Use mouse wheel for scroll interactions as R3F ScrollControls uses virtual scroll. All data-testid attributes working: category-tunnel, category-velocity, category-shader, category-exploded, category-rotation, category-parallax, example-tab-0, example-tab-1
